TEST_NAME: IR column aliases should be unique
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapi as (
        select ROW_NUMBER( ) OVER (PARTITION BY application_id,page_id,trim(lower(column_alias)) ORDER BY display_order NULLS LAST) value_dup_cnt,
                   application_id,
                   page_id,
                   region_id,
                   region_name,
                   report_label,
                   column_alias,
                   display_order,
                   created_by,
                   created_on,
                   updated_by,
                   updated_on,
                   build_option,
                   display_text_as,
                   column_id,
	                 workspace
              from apex_application_page_ir_col
	            where display_text_as not in ('HIDDEN_ESCAPE_SC')
    )
select case when aapi.value_dup_cnt > 1 
            then 'N' 
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       aapi.created_by,
       aapi.created_on,
       aapi.updated_by last_updated_by,
       aapi.updated_on last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Report Column `%0` (app %1, page %2, region `%3`) is not unique . Column aliases should be unique to the page for accessibility.', 
        p0 => aapi.column_alias, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => aapi.region_name) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Report Column `%0` (app %1, page %2, region `%3`) is not unique', 
        p0 => aapi.column_alias, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => aapi.region_name) issue_title,
       aapi.column_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapi.column_alias,
       aapi.report_label,
       aapi.display_text_as,
			 aapi.workspace
from aapi
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapi.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapi.application_id
where aapi.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: WCAG 2.0/2.1 - 'Y'.3.1 Info and Relationships, 2.4.6 Headings and Labels, 2.5.3 Label in Name, 3.3.2 Labels or Instructions, 4.1.2 Name, Role, ValueChecking that all apex object (regions, items, report column headings) are labeled appropriately
